name: Bullet Hellchemist
description:
A short indie game made by a small team of New Zealand developers for the 2022 PB&JAM game jam.

The evil Humuncuhunk is coming to steal the elixir of life! Stop him at all costs! Collect Alchemy Ingredients and hit esc to open your menu. Add alchemy ingredients to alter your gun and make it stronger. Mix and match ingredients to become the ultimate Hellchemist.
